title: derank
body:
HELLO every one  i have problem //xd
 i want to derank to bronz im right now  silver 2 people report me for this what can i do im plat 3 main account and smurf silver 2 any help can we make website that makes lobby to derank{{summoner:3}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body: We can't force you to go down in ranks as that would upset the integrity of the ranking system altogether. If you feel like your skill level is lower than you've been placed, your rank and MMR should level out after playing more games. As for issues with people reporting you, rest assured that we take that reports into consideration and will look over the gameplay to see just what exactly happened.
